attributes.additional_details:
Every day in the news we are seeing new cases of horrific and distressing crimes against animals.  Only this week stories of cats being drowned, fed to snakes and a dog who had it's throat slit by it's master are to name but a few.  Although the crimes committed are gruesome unfortunately the punishments are too lenient.
The government must review the punishments handed out to these criminals and ensure animals are protected
